response.explain: The previous action code has successfully put the pie in the oven. The next step is to close the oven.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Put the pie in the oven.
(7) Close the oven.
(8) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 7: Close the oven
    oven = registry(env, "oven_wuinhm_0")
    close(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
